definition: Spanish Sahara (former Spanish colony in Africa)

sentences.english: The Russians eventually won, invading the city in 1868.
sentences.chinese: 俄國最後贏了，於1898年入侵了布哈拉。

sentences.english: The children of Hariph, an hundred and twelve.
sentences.chinese: 哈拉的子孫一百一十二名。
要求我們阿拉伯人，”哈拉夫說。

sentences.english: Others were reported in the south of Western Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 另外，西撒哈拉沙漠南部也有蝗災的報告。

sentences.english: The O'Haras drive to Twelve Oaks for the barbeque there.
sentences.chinese: 奧哈拉一家，來到了“十二橡樹”的燒烤聚會上。

sentences.english: Three wools forever have remembered Sahara's soul with hers writing.
sentences.chinese: 三毛用她的文字永遠地記住了撒哈拉的靈魂。

sentences.english: Soon it will be hard to find the Blue Men of the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 不久，撒哈拉沙漠的藍人將成爲一道稀有的風景線。

sentences.english: The Pardhis, of whom there are more than 200,000 in Maharashtra, are especially wretched.
sentences.chinese: 馬哈拉施特邦20多萬的帕迪部落人非常不幸。

sentences.english: Now after him was Shammah the son of Agee a Hararite.
sentences.chinese: 其次是哈拉人亞基的兒子沙瑪。

sentences.english: The village of Bardai is an oasis in the heart of the Sahara Desert.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾達伊村莊是撒哈拉沙漠中心地帶的一個綠洲。

sentences.english: A member of a Berber people of northeast Algeria.
sentences.chinese: 一個撒哈拉沙漠遊牧的柏柏爾民族成員。

sentences.english: Climate change has been like an on-off switch in the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 氣候變化好像撒哈拉的一個開關。

sentences.english: He returned to Harare in the past two weeks via Harare International Airport.
sentences.chinese: 他在過去兩個星期經由哈拉雷國際機場返回哈拉雷。

sentences.english: He returned to Harare in the past two weeks via Harare International Airport.
sentences.chinese: 他在過去兩個星期經由哈拉雷國際機場返回哈拉雷。

sentences.english: Mr Prahalad’s work on strategy and innovation turned him into a superstar.
sentences.chinese: 普拉哈拉德對戰略和創新的研究讓他成爲超級巨星。

sentences.english: The history of oil in sub-Saharan Africa does not make for happy reading.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲的石油歷史讀來並不讓人愉快。
